title: Swiggyâ€™s Rs 10,000-crore issue largest among new-age IPOs since Paytm: key things to know
description: Food and grocery delivery firm Swiggy has filed an updated prospectus for its proposed initial public offering (IPO) comprising a fresh issue of Rs 3,750 crore and an offer for sale of 185.3 million shares. Here are the key things to know about the issue, the company's financials and competition.
content: Food and grocery delivery company Swiggy is set to take on rival Zomato in the public markets, as the company filed its updated draft papers with capital markets regulator Sebi on Thursday for a Rs 10,000-crore initial public offering (IPO).
